channel.title: Cannot Copy Paste Logs to chat on Mac
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I tried to copy and paste my logs when I was jailed and again after, but I tried to right click copy, which did not work, so I tried both Command C Command V and then also Control C Control V (just to see if that would work). The outcome was me typing the letter "C" over all the text I had selected instead of copying it. So I never did get to copy and paste my logs to prove who I was. So I wound up getting executed.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The logs should have been copied and then pasted with natural hot keys.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Just try and copy paste from your logs into the game chat.
#### Comments:
Let me know if you need any more info! Thanks for the help!

item.title: Cannot Copy Paste Logs to chat on Mac
item.dc:creator: chipness
item.description:
What happened?

I tried to copy and paste my logs when I was jailed and again after, but I tried to right click copy, which did not work, so I tried both Command C Command V and then also Control C Control V (just to see if that would work). The outcome was me typing the letter “C” over all the text I had selected instead of copying it. So I never did get to copy and paste my logs to prove who I was. So I wound up getting executed.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The logs should have been copied and then pasted with natural hot keys.

Steps to reproduce:

Just try and copy paste from your logs into the game chat.

Comments:

Let me know if you need any more info! Thanks for the help!
